languages.text: "Те слова, что мы услышали в капище на Футфоле. Что-то про пути, двери, обращение к некоему "владыке", к "Пределу рассвета" {n}— Ардженту трясет от омерзения.{/n} "С теми же словами на устах культисты напали на нас на Салис Прайм. Весь мой отряд погиб. Все эти честные, смелые люди, которых я повела искать святыню. Да и я сама не погибла вместе с ними лишь чудом!"

traits.locale_text: "Те слова, что мы услышали в капище на Футфоле. Что-то про пути, двери, обращение к некоему "владыке", к "Пределу Рассвета" {n}— Ардженту трясет от омерзения.{/n} "С теми же словами на устах культисты напали на нас на Салис Прайм. Весь мой отряд погиб. Все эти честные, смелые люди, которых я повела искать святыню. Да и я сама не погибла вместе с ними лишь чудом!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"
languages.original_text: "Те слова, что мы услышали в капище на Футфоле. Что-то про пути, двери, обращение к некоему "владыке", к "Пределу рассвета" {n}— Ардженту трясет от омерзения.{/n} "С теми же словами на устах культисты напали на нас на Салис Прайм. Весь мой отряд погиб. Все эти честные, смелые люди, которых я повела искать святыню. Да и я сама не погибла вместе с ними лишь чудом!"

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我们之前在落脚港邪教神殿里听到的那些祈祷，我在那个时候也听到了。他们的祷词中提到了道路与门户，提到了某个‘主’，还有‘破晓锋刃’这个词。”{n}阿洁塔的声音因为憎恨而颤抖着。{/n}“神殿里那些邪教徒，和当时在萨利斯主星袭击我们的人说着同样的祷词。我的队员们都是诚实、勇敢的人，愿意跟随我的带领寻找圣物。他们全都被消灭了，可我竟然没和他们一起战死，这恐怕只能说是奇迹了！”
languages.original_text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"

traits.locale_text: “我们之前在落脚港邪教神殿里听到的那些祈祷，我在那个时候也听到了。他们的祷词中提到了道路与门户，提到了某个‘主’，还有‘破晓终现’这句话。”{n}阿洁塔的声音因为憎恨而颤抖着。{/n}“神殿里那些邪教徒，和当时在萨利斯主星袭击我们的人说着同样的祷词。我的队员们都是诚实、勇敢的人，愿意跟随我的带领寻找圣物。他们全都被消灭了，可我竟然没和他们一起战死，这恐怕只能说是奇迹了！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Las palabras que oímos en el santuario del Culto en Paso. Algo sobre caminos, puertas, súplicas a un señor, el "Borde del Alba"». {n}Argenta se estremece, asqueada.{/n} «Eran las mismas palabras pronunciadas por los sectarios que nos atacaron en Salis Prime. Mi unidad entera fue exterminada. Esa gente valiente que me acompañó a buscar la reliquia... ¡Si no morí con ellos, fue de milagro!».
languages.original_text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"

traits.locale_text: «Las palabras que oímos en el santuario del Culto en Paso. Algo sobre caminos, puertas, súplicas a un señor, el "Borde del Alba"». {n}Argenta se estremece, asqueada.{/n} «Eran las mismas palabras pronunciadas por los sectarios que nos atacaron en Salis Prime. Mi unidad entera fue exterminada. Esa gente valiente que me acompañó a buscar la reliquia... ¡Si no morí con ellos, fue de milagro!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「フットフォールの異端の神殿で聞いた言葉。道がどうとか、扉がどうとか、『夜明けの果て』の『主 』へ向けた誓願がどうとか…」{n}アルジェンタは嫌悪感に震えている。{/n}「あれらは、サリス・プライムで私たちを襲った魔女団が口にしたのと同じ言葉だった。私の部隊は全滅した。聖遺物を探すために私が率いていた、正直で勇敢な者たち全員が。彼らと一緒に私が死ななかったのは、奇跡としか言いようがない」
languages.original_text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールの異端の神殿で聞いた言葉。道がどうとか、扉がどうとか、『夜明けの果て』の『主 』へ向けた誓願がどうとか…」{n}アルジェンタは嫌悪感に震えている。{/n}「あれらは、サリス・プライムで私たちを襲った魔女団が口にしたのと同じ言葉だった。私の部隊は全滅した。聖遺物を探すために私が率いていた、正直で勇敢な者たち全員が。彼らと一緒に私が死ななかったのは、奇跡としか言いようがない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Worte, die wir im Schrein der Ketzer auf Footfall gehört haben. Etwas über Wege, Türen, Bitten an irgendeinen 'Herren', der 'Rand des Tagesanbruchs'." {n}Argenta schüttelt sich angewidert.{/n} "Dieselben Worte sagten auch die Kultisten, die uns auf Salis Prime angriffen. Meine gesamte Einheit wurde aufgerieben. All die ehrbaren, tapferen Leute, die ich auf der Suche nach dem Relikt angeführt hatte. Nur durch ein Wunder ging ich nicht zusammen mit ihnen unter!"
languages.original_text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte, die wir im Schrein der Ketzer auf Footfall gehört haben. Etwas über Wege, Türen, Bitten an irgendeinen 'Herren', der 'Rand des Tagesanbruchs'." {n}Argenta schüttelt sich angewidert.{/n} "Dieselben Worte sagten auch die Kultisten, die uns auf Salis Prime angriffen. Meine gesamte Einheit wurde aufgerieben. All die ehrbaren, tapferen Leute, die ich auf der Suche nach dem Relikt angeführt hatte. Nur durch ein Wunder ging ich nicht zusammen mit ihnen unter!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Dans le temple des hérétiques de Castel, nous avons entendu des prières adressées à un certain "seigneur" qui parlaient de voie, de portes et de la "Lame de l'Aube", {n}se remémore Argenta en frissonnant de dégoût.{/n} Les cultistes qui nous ont attaqués sur Salis Primus ont prononcé les mêmes mots. Mon unité entière a péri, tous ces gens courageux et honnêtes que j'avais menés à la recherche de la relique. C'est un miracle que je ne sois pas morte avec eux ! »
languages.original_text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"

traits.locale_text: « Dans le temple des hérétiques de Castel, nous avons entendu des prières adressées à un certain "seigneur" qui parlaient de voie, de portes et de la "Lame de l'Aube", {n}se remémore Argenta en frissonnant de dégoût.{/n} Les cultistes qui nous ont attaqués sur Salis Primus ont prononcé les mêmes mots. Mon unité entière a péri, tous ces gens courageux et honnêtes que j'avais menés à la recherche de la relique. C'est un miracle que je ne sois pas morte avec eux ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Binliman'daki kâfir mabedinde duyduğumuz sözler... Bir 'lord'a adanan yakarışlar, kapılar, yollar ve bir isim... 'Tan Vakti' denilen meret." {n}Argenta, tiksintiden titriyor.{/n} "Salis Prime'da bize saldıran tarikatçıların da ağzından dökülüyordu. Birimimdeki herkes telef oldu. Yadigâr arayışında önderlik ettiğim o gözü pek, dürüst insanlar... Onlarla birlikte yitip gitmemiş olmam bir mucizedir."
languages.original_text: "The words we heard in the heretics' shrine on Footfall. Something about ways, doors, pleas addressed to some 'lord,' the 'Edge of Daybreak.'" {n}Argenta is shaking with disgust.{/n} "They were the same words as those spoken by the cultists who attacked us on Salis Prime. My whole unit perished. All those honest, brave people I had led to search for the relic. It was only by a miracle that I didn't perish along with them!"

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'daki kâfir mabedinde duyduğumuz sözler… Bir 'lord'a adanan yakarışlar, kapılar, yollar ve bir isim… 'Tan Vakti' denilen meret." {n}Argenta tiksintiden titriyor.{/n} "Salis Prime'da bize saldıran tarikatçıların da ağzından dökülüyordu. Birimimdeki herkes telef oldu. Yadigâr arayışında önderlik ettiğim o gözü pek, dürüst insanlar… Onlarla birlikte yitip gitmemiş olmam bir mucizeydi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
